name: Monster Word
description:
A game "prototype" by Hannah Pollow 

Created in the course: "GAME A WEEK" with the theme: "ONE BUTTON"
Week 1: 26.03-02.03.2019 

Play the little monster, who is hungry after words! If you let him eat enough, he can tell you a funny sentence and may make you laugh. 

Controls: 
- Hold left mouseclick to close the monsters mouth

Words are falling down and can be part of the genereated sentence at the end. 
Have fun!

--- 
Keyfeatures: 
1. Opening/closing the mouth of the monster to catch the words
2. Having a randomized selection of many words to get a sentence
3. Have a generated sentence at the end. 

RepositoryLink is here: https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/monster-word

Created/developed by: Hannah Pollow - https://twitter.com/Hanndragggon

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" Summer Semester 2019)
